void HttpServer::Init (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Protected service interface (called by the constructor). The implementation sends messages to the server itself to prevent ExecutionContext problems and handling all socket events in the server.

Implements Server.

BOOLEAN HttpServer::OnMessage (  const Message &  msg  )  [protected, virtual]

Parameters:
msg A system message.
Returns:
Whether the message was handled or not.

Reimplemented from ServiceThread.

void HttpServer::Start (  const InetSocketAddr &  localAddr,
DataConnProfileId  dataConnProfileId = c_invalid_data_conn_profile_id
)  [virtual]
 

Public service interface. The implementation sends messages to the server itself to prevent ExecutionContext problems and handling all socket events in the server.

Parameters:
localAddr The local socket address to bind the server to.
dataConnProfileId ID of the DataConn to use for opening sockets.

Implements Server.

void HttpServer::Stop (   )  [virtual]
 

Public service interface. The implementation sends messages to the server itself to prevent ExecutionContext problems and handling all socket events in the server.

Implements Server.

Protected service interface (called by the destructor). The implementation sends messages to the server itself to prevent ExecutionContext problems and handling all socket events in the server.
